description: This file defines a UI component for a 'Results' page in a Lightning.js application. It displays the user's quiz score and a restart button.

classes.name: Results
classes.description: A Lightning.js component displaying the quiz results and restart button.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes component state with layout, theme, and text properties.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers child components used within this component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Sets the score text based on the current route state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the restart button's onPress handler to navigate to the start route.
